bug.short_desc: texstudio can't detect an installed LaTeX distribution even though texlive is installed
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
I have installed texlive (the full scheme) with dnf and then I installed texstudio. Upon starting it, it exhibits a message window telling me it couldn't find a LaTeX distribution. When I checked the settings, it hadn't assigned anything to latex, pdflatex, etc.
I can confirm these commands are available in the PATH.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 2.12.0-1.fc25
How reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Install texlive 2. Install texstudio 3. Start texstudio
Actual results: message saying it couldn't find a LaTeX distribution.
Expected results: normal startup and detection of the LaTeX binaries.
Additional info: None needed.

This applies to Fedora 24 too. I have used a computer which has Fedora 24 running for some months and does updates nightly by dnf-automatic.
When I start texstudio by an account which hasn't used texstudio previously.
texstudio-2.12.0-1.fc24.x86_64
One possible workaround (to be confirmed) is to install texstudio 2.11.2, run it once and then let dnf update it to 2.12.0. Anyway, it would still need fixing, apparently upstream.
https://sourceforge.net/p/texstudio/bugs/2037/ It's fixed upstream, will do an upgrade as soon as possible.
I fixed it, will create the updates now.
Upstream is in the process of producing an update, there's a release candidate for 2.12.2 already. Don't know if it's worth the effort.
Is a very small patch changing one line, so I just did it, not much effort :)
texstudio-2.12.0-2.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-5eb087b619
texstudio-2.12.0-2.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-20bd80dc3f

texstudio-2.12.0-2.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-20bd80dc3f

See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. texstudio-2.12.0-2.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
texstudio-2.12.0-2.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
